TopicTitle: How do I change my profile signature?

Articles.Content:
Hey everybody,

I've had the game for quite a while, but I'm new to the forums and I just found the medal designer thing for signatures. However, i have absolutely no idea how to change my signature, and I can't seem to find a button anywhere in the settings menu. Can someone help me?

Noob question I know, any help is appreciated.

Thanks!

-Commander Tom

Kerbal Space Force

You need to have 3 approved posts before you can modify your profile.

Cheers!

Capt'n Skunky

KSP Community Manager
Wait... it says I have 5 posts. I still can't do it...?

It's under your Settings (right next to "Log Out" at the very top of the forum screen). Click on it and pick "Edit Signature" along the side bar. You then put something like this in it:


In space, no one can hear you pass gas... 
(CENTER)(img)http://ribbons.cgagnier.ca/image.php?ribbon=3114(/img)(/CENTER)

And be sure to save it (replace the parentheses with brackets).
